title: Lesson 40
paragraph: This lesson examines change and adaptation, highlighting flexibility, growth, and evolution.

words.example: Her ideas about strategy were fluid and open to discussion.

words.meaning: capable of being shaped or influenced
words.japaneseMeaning: 柔軟な、影響されやすい
words.example: Young minds are malleable and easy to educate.

words.japaneseMeaning: 変革をもたらす、変化を促す
words.example: The internet had a transformative effect on communication.

words.meaning: relating to gradual development or change
words.japaneseMeaning: 進化の、段階的な発展の
words.example: Evolutionary theories explain species adaptation over time.

words.meaning: favoring or promoting change and improvement
words.example: The government adopted progressive policies for education.

words.meaning: relating to or characteristic of a process of change
words.example: The country was in a transitional period after the election.
The dynamic market required flexible strategies.

words.meaning: able to adjust to new conditions
words.japaneseMeaning: 適応力のある、順応性のある
words.example: Species must be adaptive to survive environmental changes.

words.japaneseMeaning: 改革的な、改善のための
words.example: The reformative policies improved public health.
